results.overview: A viral ritual allows three kids to conjure people from the walls as they must now try to put them back before it is too late.
results.title: The People In The Walls

results.overview: In town for a job interview, a young woman arrives at her Airbnb late at night only to find that it has been mistakenly double-booked and a strange man is already staying there. Against her better judgement, she decides to stay the night anyway.
results.title: Barbarian

results.overview: Fifteen-year-old Emma Evans is like any other teenage girl; she thinks that her parents don't understand her. She longs for independence and a life free of family ties and responsibilities and she is prepared to do anything to achieve it. But one day she will be forced to face up to the consequences of her actions.Life seems to be carrying on as normal, until one day Emma starts experiencing frightening fits. Her parents are convinced that her problems are either medical or psychological, but when doctors' tests are unable to draw any conclusions, the family is forced to look elsewhere for answers.It all started off as a bit of fun, Emma never really believed it, but the truth is there is something dark and sinister within her, and it won't take long to surface.
results.title: Exorcismus

results.overview: Nothing is what it seems when a twisted one-night stand spirals into a serial killer’s vicious murder spree.
results.title: Strange Darling

results.overview: Professor Jorge Ollot and Dr. Iris de Miguel have gathered a group of people, carefully chosen, with whom they will be isolated for a week in a secluded house. Their intention? To demonstrate that the paranormal exists, but that it is our own mind that provokes it.
results.title: Fantasmagoría

results.overview: Flight 7500 departs Los Angeles International Airport bound for Tokyo. As the overnight flight makes its way over the Pacific Ocean during its ten-hour course, the passengers encounter what appears to be a supernatural force in the cabin.
results.title: Flight 7500

results.overview: In the future, scientists found a way to grow human organs inside dinosaurs to harvest them for profit. But when the dinosaurs break out, the scientists that created them have to find ways undo the terrible mistakes they have done.
results.title: Triassic World

results.overview: Ing is sent to Pinijkhun Reform School, an all-girls facility on a remote island. The only rule here is that everyone must obey orders.
results.title: Host

results.overview: The story follows a team of highly trained operatives who find themselves trapped inside an isolated military compound.
results.title: Armed Response

results.overview: A psychiatrist poses as an ex-sorority sister to stop a slasher freed by a computer error.
results.title: Silent Madness

results.overview: Sherlock Holmes and Watson are on the trail of a criminal and scientific mastermind who seems to control monsters and creations which defy belief.
results.title: Sherlock Holmes

results.overview: Set in the 1980s, an estranged family hires a cult deprogrammer to take back their teenage son from a murderous cult, but find themselves under siege when the cultists surround their cabin, demanding the boy back.
results.title: Jackals

results.overview: The overnight stock crew of a local supermarket find themselves being stalked and slashed by a mysterious maniac.
results.title: Intruder

results.overview: A driving instructor must use her other-worldly gifts to save a lonely man’s daughter from a rock star looking to use her for Satanic purposes.
results.title: Extra Ordinary

results.overview: On the mysterious planet of Ash, Riya awakens to find her crew slaughtered. When a man named Brion arrives to rescue her, an ordeal of psychological and physical terror ensues while Riya and Brion must decide if they can trust one another to survive.
results.title: Ash

results.overview: 1920, rural Ireland. Anglo-Irish twins Rachel and Edward share a strange existence in their crumbling family estate. Each night, the property becomes the domain of a sinister presence (The Lodgers) which enforces three rules upon the twins: they must be in bed by midnight; they may not permit an outsider past the threshold; and if one attempts to escape, the life of the other is placed in jeopardy. When troubled war veteran Sean returns to the nearby village, he is immediately drawn to the mysterious Rachel, who in turn begins to break the rules set out by The Lodgers. The consequences pull Rachel into a deadly confrontation with her brother - and with the curse that haunts them.
results.title: The Lodgers

results.overview: A teenager's weekend at a lake house with her father takes a turn for the worse when a group of convicts wreaks havoc on their lives.
results.title: Becky

results.overview: Brothers John and Matt have inherited an island cabin from their recently deceased uncle. Along with Matt's girlfriend, Nicki, and other mutual friends, the siblings travel to the cabin for a relaxing weekend getaway. But, not long after arriving, the group is besieged by ravenous dogs. They watch in horror as another vacationer, Luke, is eaten alive. Soon, they discover a training facility where the dogs have been bred to kill.
results.title: The Breed

results.overview: Lorraine and Ed Warren travel to north London to help a single mother raising four children alone in a house plagued by malicious spirits.
results.title: The Conjuring 2

results.overview: Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren work to help a family terrorized by a dark presence in their farmhouse. Forced to confront a powerful entity, the Warrens find themselves caught in the most terrifying case of their lives.
results.title: The Conjuring
